original_body_lines: The Sell-X Computers Pvt. Ltd. a leader in the sale of all brands of computers in Sri Lanka, opened its head office and showroom in a new five-storied building.Sell-X Computers with a distribution network across Sri Lanka and focusing on the Southern Province and the capital, moved its headquarters to a new building in Galle, Kithulampitiya area, further establishing the trust it has won among the customers for almost two decades. The new head office also will facilitate the expansion of the company’s services to its customers.

“Sell-X Computers Pvt. was initiated with five used computers, almost two decades ago. Today, our company has become a huge organization that distributes sells and provides after-sales services for all the world’s major brands in Sri Lanka. We have five branches in Galle district, two branches in Matara district, one branch in Colombo and a strong distribution network spread across the island” Founder and CEO of sell-X Computers Pvt. Sameera Bopage said.

Sell-X Computers Pvt. Ltd. today is working beyond the sale of computers to provide other modern technical services related to computers. Currently sell-X Computers has expanded its product range and services to include, CCTV and security solutions with renowned expertise in computers. Also it provides end-to-end solutions for businesses and homes including network solutions, camera solutions, security and access control solutions, Personal Automated Branch Exchange (PABX) solutions, Public Address Sound Systems (PASS).
